title: The Lion King (2019)
stars: Donald Glover, Beyoncé, Seth Rogen, Chiwetel Ejiofor
story: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: David Crosby: Remember My Name (2019)
stars: David Crosby, Cameron Crowe, Henry Diltz, Graham Nash
story: Meet David Crosby in this portrait of a man with everything but an easy retirement on his mind.

title: Between Me and My Mind (2019)
stars: Ernest Anastasio, Sue Anastasio, Trey Anastasio, Jon Fishman
story: Driven by a constant need to create, Phish frontman Trey Anastasio takes on new projects, including some of his most personal music to date as well as Phish's ambitious New Year's Eve show at Madison Square Garden.

title: Into the Ashes (2019)
stars: Ernest Anastasio, Sue Anastasio, Trey Anastasio, Jon Fishman

title: At War (2018)
stars: Vincent Lindon, Mélanie Rover, Jacques Borderie, David Rey

title: Rosie (2018)
stars: Sarah Greene, Moe Dunford, Ellie O'Halloran, Ruby Dunne

title: Streetwise (1984)
stars: Roberta Joseph Hayes, Baby Gramps, Erin Blackwell, Lou Ellen Couch

title: Spider-Man: Far from Home (2019)
stars: Tom Holland, Samuel L. Jackson, Jake Gyllenhaal
